description: FEATURESLogitech Comfort Lapdesk for NotebooksRoom-to-room laptop comfortUsing your laptop around your house is about to feel a lot more comfortable. With its heat-shielding design, padded underside and angled notebook riser, this lightweight lapdesk helps you keep cool and comfy—on the sofa, floor, bed or wherever you want to curl up with your laptop at home. Download a spec sheet
title: Logitech Comfort Lapdesk N500 (white/grey)
